DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HLA A2+ . Other HLA match sibling . CD4 count 100350 cells/mm3 . No active opportunistic infection malignancy ( cutaneous Kaposi 's sarcoma ) . Current stable antiviral regimen . Normal lab value chest xray . Donor sibling must : HLA A2+ . HIV negativity . Good venous access . Ability donate multiple occasion . Negative status hepatitis B C. Exclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Immunomodulators . Cytokines . Systemic steroid . IV pentamidine . Investigational drug .
